data.summary: Phase 1 design finalized for unified terminal contract + routing.
key_decisions: Legacy aliases mapped deterministically: run/send/create -> execute; kill/close -> terminate
Runtime modes explicit: interactive vs headless
PM_TERM compatibility taxonomy defined for deterministic error handling
All terminal routing enforced via Rust+QML interactive-terminal path
Headless execution restricted by strict subset gate selected by action/runtime mode
No bypass path to deprecated split surface
